channel.title: Introduction to Psychology on Liwen's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction to Psychology on Liwen's blog

item.title: Introduction to Psychology - Happiness
item.description: Happiness Happiness is a goal-state animals have evolved to pursue; a ginal that needs to be satisfied.

item.title: Introduction to Psychology - Differences & Clinical Psychology
item.description: Differences How/Why are people different? Gender identity, sexual preference, happiness, success and failure in life, mental illness; Personality, Intelligence

item.title: Introduction to Psychology - Emotions
item.description: Evolution of emotion The brain is a product of evolution.

item.title: Introduction to Psychology - Perception and Attention & Memory
item.description: From the world to the mind Proximity Similarity Closure Good continuation Common movement Good form Perception of brightness, object, depth

item.title: Introduction to Psychology - Language
item.description: Abstract and unconscious rules Phonology Morphology: morpheme = the smallest meaningful unit

item.title: Introduction to Psychology - Big questions about development
item.description: Big questions about development Morality, continuity, knowledge (empiricism: based on experience, nativism: innate rather than acquired by learning, contructivism: construct knowledge rather than just passively take in information)

item.title: Introduction to Psychology - Freud
item.description: The Sigmund Freud Born in Australia, one of the famous scholars.

item.title: Introduction to Psychology - Skinner
item.description: B.F. Skinner Behaviorism: Emphasis on learning: there is no human nature.

item.title: Introduction to Psychology - The Brain
item.description: About Psychology What are people most afraid of? What do our dreams mean?
